DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence Study Budesonide/Formoterol Easyhaler Symbicort Turbohaler Asthmatics
DOC.criteria: Males female age 1860 year document diagnosis asthma Prebronchodilator force expiratory volume one second ( FEV1 ) least 80 % predict value The asthma stable regular treatment least 4 week screen .
